column2: Author: Sardo - ver. 1.0 - 05.01.2016 --- Modified by metabeealex09
Attack: FF Barch Single Wave, +1 tile from redline
Make these Troops: Barbarians 50%, Archers 50%, or Barracks Mode
Will drop Barb, Arch, All Heroes and Castle if enabled from GUI

column10: Main side it's useless, random choice
MAKE BARBARIAN VECTORS
from vertex sx and dx to middle sides (20 drop points), 1 tile from red line
from middle sides sx and dx to up and down vertex (20 drop points), 1 tile from red line
DROP BARBARIANS
Add wait time... Preparing to drop
launch barbarians using all 4 vectors concurrently...
launch barbarians using all 4 vectors concurrently...
MAKE ARCHERS VECTORS
from vertex sx and dx to middle sides (20 drop points)
from middle sides sx and dx to up and down vertex (20 drop points)
DROP ARCHERS
launch archers using all 4 vectors concurrently...
launch archers using all 4 vectors concurrently...
DROP REMAINING BARBS IF TROOP COMPOSITION ARENT BALANCED
from middle sides sx and dx to up and down vertex (20 drop points), 1 tile from red line
launch remaining barbarians if any
DROP REMAINING ARCHS IF TROOP COMPOSITION ARENT BALANCED
from middle sides sx and dx to up and down vertex (20 drop points)
launch remaining archers if any
Add a wait time; during wait time also CHECK exit values (exit if no resource left, exit if one or two starts reach)
MAKE VECTORS TO DROP KINK, QUEEN and CASTLE
random side to drop queen and castle, at 3 tiles from redarea
random side to drop king, at 1 tile from redarea
DROP BARBARIANS
launch Castle                                                     castle
launch King                                                       king
launch Queen                                                      queen
launch Grand Warden                                               queen
